description.title: Description/Instructions
description.placeholder: Write a summary and any details your invitee should know about the event.

dateRange.title: Date range
dateRange.subtitle: When can people book this meeting? Set a range of dates when you can accept meetings.
dateRange.custom: Enter number of days: From today
dateRange.errorMessage: A date range that cannot be set.

duration.title: Duration
duration.subtitle: Define how long your event will be. It can be as long as 12 hours.
duration.emptyMessage: Please select one or more time units.

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Add a location. You can add multiple locations that invitee can choose.
location.googleMeetGuide: (With Google integration, the Google Meet link will be sent automatically through sendtime).
location.zoomGuide: (With Zoom integration, the Zoom link will be sent automatically through sendtime).

preview.title: Preview Page
preview.subtitle: Select open slots on the calendar.

timeSlotSetting.title: Invitee can send you time suggestions up to..
timeSlotSetting.subtitle: You can select from one to ten.

availability.title: Availability setting
availability.subtitle:
Define custom hours for your booking page's availability. 
Invitees can't request appointments outside of the day/time range selected below.

buffer.title: Add time before or after your event.
buffer.subtitle: Give yourself some buffer time to prepare for or wrap up from booked Sendtime events.

hideEventInfo.title: Masking calendar event information
hideEventInfo.subtitle: You can make calendar event content public or private to the invitees.

remind.title: Reminder Notification
remind.subtitle: When an event is confirmed, a reminder email is automatically sent to you and the invitee 1 day before the event for the confirmed event.

customBlockingTimes.guide:
Finally, if there are times when you don't want your invitee to book, 
please drag&click on the calendar below to set a custom Do Not Disturb time.

mobile.blockingTimeGuide: To Set Do Not Disturb time, head to the web.
